attributes.action: Award a Medal to any British service man or woman injured in the service of their country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British Forces are being injured during service to there Queen and Country yet this Country doesnt recognise the sacrifice they make.People are left blind or deaf or brain damaged or even losing limbs yet nothing is given to them to recognise them.please without these people we wouldnt have a Country worth living in America has the purple heart we have nothing.
